LanguageData.JRWMetriacanthosaurusReconstruct.label: Metriacanthosaurus
LanguageData.JRWMetriacanthosaurusReconstruct.descrip:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03837-1923 [METRIACANTHOSAURUS PARKERI] CODENAME: AKANTHA >155
A metriacanthosaurid theropod. While dwarfed by many larger theropods, this carnivore makes up for the lack of power with speed and tenacity. Their hardy spikes make for a reliable defense against attacks from above.
